description.p: Specifies a pullback constraint on a composition relationship. This is a certain type of existence assertion.
Used to specify a pullback diagram of relationships in which the subject composition relationship participates.
For a discussion of the role of pullback diagrams in entity modelling see section ExistenceAssertions/Pullbacks of the online entity modelling book.

reference.name: projection_rel
reference.description: Specifies one of the sides of a pullback diagram.

composition.name: along
composition.description: Specifies one of the sides of a pullback diagram.

reference.name: type
reference.description: Specifies one of the corners of a pullback diagram.
